name: LimeAll
overview:
LimeAll is aimed at helping people solve the problem of staying in touch, giving a personal feel to their communications conveniently, taking them into a new era of greetings, reminders, invitations and photos sharing.

Their suite of free services allows users to::

  1. Dedicate and play self-recorded message followed by a song on a friend’s phone

  2. Create and share musical photo albums that can be played with a personalized message and song in the background.

  3. Receive birthday reminders on phone.

  4. Preset call and video greetings that would be sent automatically

LimeAll added new services recently:

Launched a new website TringAll (http://www.TringAll.com) TringAll provides two services: Call Broadcast: Record a message and send it to multiple contacts.

Emergency Notifier: Setup your emergency message and with just one phone ring (ring and disconnect) TringAll alerts your contacts by calls, emails and sms immediately.
